overview: The richness and intensity of Richard Strauss's masterful one-act opera, in Herbert Wernicke's compelling production, vividly portrays the relentless pursuit and ecstatic realization of vengeance.  Featuring Linda Watson, Jane Henschel, Manuela Uhl, Rene Kollo, and Albert Dohmen.  The Philharmonia Chor Wien and MÃ¼nchner Philharmoniker are conducted by Christian Thielemann
title: Elektra
